extendedInfo.description: by Spilt Milk StudiosTake on all comers, avoid collisions and score MILLIONS of points in this stunning game of skill and quick reflexes!Guide our plucky underdog hero Lionel in his epic task to KILL ALL LINES, pick up lovely GLOWY THINGS, fight for survival (in SPAAAAAACE!) and most importantly DON'T CRASH! This is literally the funniest game you will ever play that has a glowing yellow line as the main character.Presented with full HD graphics for this Android version for both phones and tablets. On tablets, play in the specially crafted EXTREME mode for 4x the challenge!***Number 3 in the Quality Index's Top 10 iPhone games of June 2011***Outwit the hilarious AI in a never-ending quest for points and glory!Aim to beat your personal best over 6 distinctly fast, fun and frantic gameplay modes.Inspired by classic arcade games from years gone by (you know the ones we're talking about!), we've brought them kicking and screaming onto your Android device!***Number 10 in the Quality Index's Top 10 iPhone games of the last 6 months!***Screen-searing graphics, a bass-thumping retro soundtrack and endless replay value make this must-play package unlike anything else you've played.AppSpy: 5/5 "Amusing writing, multiple modes and competitive AI go a long way to revive this classic game."Slide To Play: 4/4 "You will believe...that lines have feelings, too."Fusion-Gamer 10/10 "Humor, simplicity, difficulty, originality & a damn good soundtrack all blend together to create the perfect app package."Pixelated Sausage: 5/5 "Hard Lines is one of the best iPhone games I've played in quite some time."Daily Joypad: 5/5 "Some of the most stylish retro visuals seen on the App store."148Apps: 4.5/5 "Hard Lines is a little gem simply put. Itâs immensely enjoyable offering that âjust one more goâ mentality."Edge Online: 8/10 "Original, funny and intense, this score-attack game is anything but an idle distraction."Features:* Hilarious Quips* 6 Lovely Game Modes* Crivens! Endless Replay Value

reviews.title: Doesn\'t run
reviews.comment: Won\'t run on HTC Rezound. When it starts up it just shows a bunch of curved yellow lines and freezes at that screen
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix :)
reviews.comment: The game refuses to run on the Galaxy S3. When can we expect a fix? It\'s been almost 3 months since the release...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Works on my a500 tab but not my evo3d.   You should add options for speed to ramp it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good...
reviews.comment: But ate 35% of my battery in just 20 minutes (Samsung Galaxy S 2). Phone got quite hot too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good fun.
reviews.comment: Evokes memories of Sneech. Messages would be better if the other lines had names :) Well polished, no complaints, Sensation XE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Max
reviews.comment: No idea why this isn\'t in the top 20 games. Compelling and addictive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Snaaaaaaaaakkkkkkeeeeeeee!
reviews.comment: There are no cardboard box-based stealth sections to this game.  However, it is one of the most entertaining snake/light-cycle games, with plenty of modes to keep you occupied.  Works exceptionally well on both small and big screens, with three different control mechanisms to ensure that you\'re doing what you mean to be doing.  Simple enough that my three year-old can play it, fleshed out enough so that an adult can play, and play, and play again (and enjoy the very funny comments).  Get it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes and REFUSES to exit!  Had to pull battery!
reviews.comment: Crashes and REFUSES to exit!  Had to pull battery!  I regret buying this game.  What is it doing to stall my phone so solidly?  The game keeps playing its music, but the phone refuseed to return to the home screen or do anything else.  I am uninstalling. Needs a LOT more testing before release.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Additive
reviews.comment: Extremely addictive for short bursts of fun. UI is extremely nice and many different game modes offer loads of variety.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: That\'s how you make a snake game
reviews.comment: Been looking for a modern Snake for a while. This fits perfectly an boasts a bunch of varied game modes. Think Geometry Wars with Snake base. Some additional features would still be nice, but looking at the download statistics, I can see why it doesn\'t get supported any more. It\'s really sad that such a gem gets buried by endless runner clones and whatnot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game, fun and addictive.  For those having the startup crash, just leave it running for 30 seconds or so, the game will start working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: (Stupid title thing)
reviews.comment: Fun game that is extremely polished and well done, looks XBL Indie quality (the good kind) would love to see more options (ie: lives in gaunlet mode)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars, but...
reviews.comment: The game is great for what it is. definitely worth the money spent on it. I only have a few complaints                       1) I was expecting there to be a tron lightcycle style mode. basically 1-8 lines, and the lines continually stretch. they never disappear. Anyone who has seen a tron movie or played armagetron advanced knows exactly what I am talking about                         2) A demo would be nice. I\'m glad I did decide to buy it, but the decision would have been easier if I had gotten to play a timed game (maybe like 1-5 minutes) in the survival game mode beforehand.     otherwise, the game is great, fun, and worth every penny.
reviews.author: Fiskie Rexie

reviews.title: great but....
reviews.comment: Great game. Modern day snake is very good yet overshadowed by the more impressive alternative modes.  Only down side is it needs to be able to switch screen around on a nexus 7 as I am right handed and keep swiping the google now toggle by mistake. Double annoying because there is no resume when you to to go back you have to load it again. Very annoying!!!  Apart from that it is very good. How about a modern retro version of bombjack?
reviews.author: Simon Downs

reviews.comment: Excellent game. It will make you laugh.  This is the most fun Snake game I\'ve ever played.  Very cleaver design.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: 500 billion stars seriously :)

reviews.title: By the power of greyskull!
reviews.comment: Such a great game. The humor makes it.  I can\'t play a game without laughing at one of the one liners

reviews.title: Funny!
reviews.comment: It\'s good to have an addicting game. It\'s even better to have an addicting AND funny one. :)

reviews.comment: Superb game, like an Xbox Live Arcade game.
